    • Field Detail

      • INTERPOLATION_PATTERN

        public static final java.util.regex.Pattern INTERPOLATION_PATTERN
        Matches an interpolation in a C# 6 interpolation string.

      • UNKNOWN_ARITY

        public static final int UNKNOWN_ARITY
        Value for a unknown method arity. This value is used if a method name is found in a method reference.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • isMainMethod

        public static boolean isMainMethod(ShallowEntity method)
        Determines, if the given method is a valid Main method according to the Microsoft documentation

      • retrieveMethodReferences

        public static SetMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> retrieveMethodReferences(java.util.List<IToken> tokens)
        Retrieves all possible method references from the given tokens and adds them to the given SetMap. A method reference here means any instance where a method is basically handled like an object or a reference, so any actual method invocation is not included.

      • extractInterpolatedCalls

        public static java.util.List<IToken> extractInterpolatedCalls(java.util.List<IToken> tokens)
        Filters a list of tokens for interpolated literal calls.
        • Example of an interpolated literal: String string = $"{foo(a, b)} comment";
        Parameters:
        tokens - to check for interpolated literal tokens.
        Returns:
        interpolated literal tokens.

      • tokenizeInterpolatedCalls

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<IToken>> tokenizeInterpolatedCalls(java.util.List<IToken> interpolatedStringTokens)
        Tokenize the interpolated calls in string token.
        Parameters:
        interpolatedStringToken - to be tokenized.
        Returns:
        interpolated variables and methods separated in a list of tokens.

      • checkForVariableUseInStringInterpolation

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> checkForVariableUseInStringInterpolation(java.util.List<IToken> tokens,
                                                                                         java.lang.String variableName)
        Checks whether the given variable name was used in a string interpolation in the given tokens. Returns a list with the indices of its occurrences.
